Package org.jruyi.common

JRuyi Common Package Version 1.2

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ArgList.IFactory
    A factory class to create instances of IArgList.
    CharsetCodec.IFactory
    A factory class to create instances of ICharsetCodec.
    IArgList
    A list holding arguments.
    IByteSequence
    A byte sequence is a readable sequence of byte values.
    ICharsetCodec
    A charset codec used to encode characters into bytes and decode bytes into characters.
    ICloseable
    A closeable object indicates that it need be closed to release resources it holds.
    IDumpable
    Indicates that this object can be dumped.
    IService
    Defines the life cycle methods that a service need implement.
    IServiceHolder<T>
    A service holder.
    IServiceHolderManager<T>
    Service for tracking and managing services of type T.
    IThreadLocalCache<E>
    A local cache bound to the current thread.
    ServiceHolderManager.IFactory
    A factory to create IServiceHolderManager objects.
    ThreadLocalCache.IFactory
    A factory class to create instances of IThreadLocalCache.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ArgList
    This is the factory class for IArgList.
    BiListNode<E>
    A node that contains 2 references to point to previous node and next node respectively, and a reference to hold a data element.
    Blob
    A Blob consists of a list of byte sequences.
    ByteKmp
    A byte sequence to be searched for using the Knuth–Morris–Pratt algorithm.
    BytesBuilder
    A utility class for building a byte array.
    CharKmp
    A character sequence to be searched for using the Knuth–Morris–Pratt algorithm.
    CharsetCodec
    This is the factory class for ICharsetCodec.
    HashSet
    An Object hash set.
    IntStack
    An auto-growing int stack.
    ListNode<E>
    A node contains a reference to the next node and a reference to the element data.
    Properties
    A substitution class to Hashtable to be used for Dictionary properties in OSGi, for synchronization is not necessary and does a penalty to the performance.
    Service
    This class provides a default implementation for state transition of a service.
    ServiceHolderManager
    This is the factory class for IServiceHolderManager.
    StringBuilder
    A utility class for building a String.
    StrUtil
    A string utility class.
    ThreadLocalCache
    This is the factory class for IThreadLocalCache.
